thread.section_title: Cook Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cook Travel | www.cooktravel.net
thread.title: Michael Crawford
thread.title_full: Cook Travel reviewed by Michael Crawford

author: Michael Crawford
title: Michael Crawford
text: I have used Cook twice in the last year. Both times were round trip Business class trips to Europe. Beata Lubitz took care of me both times with considerable value added and very good results. I will continue to avail myself of Beata's good service at Cook going forward.
